sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email"><sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><blind_copied/><body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
</style>

</head><body><p><strong>NOTICE</strong> a network incident INC0010001 was assigned critical priority.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Caller: Alene Rabeck</p>
<p>Short description: Wifi is down at east campus </p>
<p>Description: </p>
<p>Review and address this incident as soon as possible.</p>
<p>Thank you,</p>
<p>IT Support&nbsp;</p>

<br><br>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_email_c184ddea83c322107f44168c50da1e77
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_email"><sys_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><blind_copied/><body><html><head><style>
	#snc_notification_preference {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
	
	#snc_notification_unsubscribe {
		text-decoration: none;
	}
</style>

</head><body><p><strong>NOTICE</strong> a network incident INC0010002 was assigned critical priority.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Caller: Carmel Overfelt</p>
<p>Short description: remote employees are  having VPN issues </p>
<p>Description: Because the VPN is down, remote employees are unable to log to complete work </p>
<p>Review and address this incident as soon as possible.</p>
<p>Thank you,</p>
<p>IT Support&nbsp;</p>

<br><br>

<a id="snc_notification_unsubscribe" href="mailto:?subject=Unsubscribe from &quot;critical network incident notification&quot;&amp;body=Sending this email with the predefined content in the subject and body will unsubscribe you from the notification &quot;critical network incident notification&quot;%0D%0A%0D%0AUnsubscribe:{&quot;id&quot;:&quot;520c05ee838322107f44168c50da1e37&quot;,&quot;token&quot;:&quot;c797e62132&quot;}">Unsubscribe</a> | <a id="snc_notification_preference" href="https://kura-labs-jul-4728-0011.lab.service-now.com/nav_to.do?uri=notification_preferences.do%3Fsysparm_notification=520c05ee838322107f44168c50da1e37">Notification Preferences</a><div>&nbsp;</div><div style="display:inline">Ref:MSG0000723_JDc6FhnchudZgSHMqzXJ</div></body></html></body><body_text/><checkpoint>0</checkpoint><content_type>text/html</content_type><copied/><deleted>false</deleted><direct>brendan.qin@example.com,brice.hedglin@example.com,bradly.hasselvander@example.com,alyssa.biasotti@example.com,alva.pennigton@example.com,amelia.caputo@example.com,brent.vaidya@example.com,brant.darnel@example.com,jacklyn.emayo@example.com,amos.linnan@example.com,karla.ken@example.com</direct><error_string/><headers>X-ServiceNow-Source:Notification-520c05ee838322107f44168c50da1e37
List-Unsubscribe:<mailto:?body=Sending+this+email+with+the+predefined+content+in+the+subject+and+body+will+unsubscribe+you+from+the+notification.%0D%0A%0D%0AUnsubscribe%3A%7B%22id%22%3A%22520c05ee838322107f44168c50da1e37%22%2C%22token%22%3A%22c797e62132%22%7D
 &subject=Unsubscribe+from+%22critical+network+incident+notification%22>
X-ServiceNow-SysEmail-Version:2
</headers><importance>high</importance><instance>c404d9aa83c322107f44168c50da1e48</instance><mailbox display_value="Outbox">outbox</mailbox><message_id/><notification_type>SMTP</notification_type><receive_type>new</receive_type><recipients>brendan.qin@example.com,brice.hedglin@example.com,bradly.hasselvander@example.com,alyssa.biasotti@example.com,alva.pennigton@example.com,amelia.caputo@example.com,brent.vaidya@example.com,brant.darnel@example.com,jacklyn.emayo@example.com,amos.linnan@example.com,karla.ken@example.com</recipients><reply_to/><state>ready</state><status/><subject>Critical Network Incident INC0010002 was created byCarmel Overfelt</subject><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-02 00:32:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>c184ddea83c322107f44168c50da1e77</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-02 00:32:25</sys_updated_on><target_table>incident</target_table><type>send-ready</type><uid>N/A</uid><user/><user_id/><weight>0</weight></sys_email></record_update>
